Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]

My added code;
Variables in Client.java:

public boolean ping1 = false; public boolean ping2 = false; public boolean ping3 = false; public boolean ping4 = false; public boolean ping5 = false; public boolean ping6 = false;
Code in ClickObject.java:

case 2295://log if(c.ping1 = false){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2474, 3429, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping1 = true; } break; case 2285://net if(c.ping2 = false && c.ping1 = true){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2473, 3424, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping2 = true; } break; case 2313://tree if(c.ping3 = false && c.ping2 = true &&c.ping1 = true){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2473, 3420, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping3 = true; } break; case 2312://rope if(c.ping4 = false && c.ping2 = true &&c.ping1 = true && c.ping3 = true){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2483, 3420, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping4 = true; } break; case 2314://laddertoground c.getPA().movePlayer(2486, 3420, 0); break; case 2286://net2 if(c.ping5 = false && c.ping2 = true &&c.ping1 = true && c.ping3 = true && c.ping4 = true){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2485, 3427, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping5 = true; } break; case 154://pipe if(c.ping6 = false && c.ping2 = true &&c.ping1 = true && c.ping3 = true && c.ping4 = true && c.ping5 = true){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2484, 3437, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(2000, c.playerAgility); c.ping1 = false; c.ping2 = false; c.ping3 = false; c.ping4 = false; c.ping5 = false; c.ping6 = false; }
